definitions.text: a natural protective body covering and site of the sense of touch
examples: your skin is the largest organ of your body

definitions.text: body covering of a living animal
a person's skin regarded as their life
examples: he tried to save his skin

definitions.text: the rind of a fruit or vegetable
a bag serving as a container for liquids; it is made from the hide of an animal
climb awkwardly, as if by scrambling
bruise, cut, or injure the skin or the surface of
examples: The boy skinned his knee when he fell

definitions.text: remove the bark of a tree
